content.raw_text: From: SHOWTIME <welcome@mail.showtime.com> To: oliver.green@google.com Date: Mon, 10 Mar 2025 09:17:42 -0400 Subject: Welcome to SHOWTIME! Your streaming adventure starts now Message-ID: <20250310131742.2001.welcome@showtime.com> Hi Oliver, Thank you for subscribing to SHOWTIME. • Plan: Monthly Streaming (HD) • Price: US $10.99 + tax • Payment method: Visa •••• 4473 • Invoice #: ST-INV-1357913579 Sign in at https://www.showtime.com to begin watching originals like “Billions” and “Yellowjackets.” —The SHOWTIME Team *Need help? Replies are monitored Mon–Fri, 9 am–6 pm ET.*

From: SHOWTIME <trials@mail.showtime.com> To: mai.kawasaki@google.com Date: Tue, 18 Mar 2025 18:55:03 +0900 Subject: Your 7-day SHOWTIME trial is live Message-ID: <20250318105503.2002.trial@showtime.com> こんにちは Mai, Your free trial runs through 25 Mar 2025. Unless you cancel, we’ll bill ¥1,320 on 26 Mar 2025 to Mastercard •••• 0098. Watch now → https://www.showtime.com/start Enjoy, SHOWTIME

From: SHOWTIME <alerts@mail.showtime.com> To: mai.kawasaki@google.com Date: Sun, 23 Mar 2025 08:02:18 +0900 Subject: 48 hours left in your SHOWTIME trial Message-ID: <20250322230218.2003.trial-end@showtime.com> Hi Mai, Your trial ends on 25 Mar 2025. Do nothing to keep streaming—billing begins ¥1,320/month on 26 Mar. To cancel: Account › Subscription before the trial ends. Thanks for trying SHOWTIME!

From: SHOWTIME <receipts@mail.showtime.com> To: mai.kawasaki@yahoo.com Date: Wed, 26 Mar 2025 00:04:22 +0900 Subject: Your subscription is active—payment received Message-ID: <20250326120422.2004.trial-conv@showtime.com> Hello Mai, We successfully processed your first monthly charge. • Amount: ¥1,320 • Date: 26 Mar 2025 • Order ID: ST-JP-03261204 Enjoy SHOWTIME originals, movies, and live sports. —SHOWTIME Finance

From: SHOWTIME <receipts@mail.showtime.com> To: emma.stevens@gmail.com Date: Tue, 1 Apr 2025 02:11:10 +0000 Subject: April invoice—SHOWTIME Streaming Message-ID: <20250401021110.2005.monthly@showtime.com> Hello Emma, We’ve charged A$14.99 for your April access (1 Apr–30 Apr 2025). A PDF receipt is attached. Stay entertained, SHOWTIME Billing

From: SHOWTIME <billing@mail.showtime.com> To: maya_li@yahoo.com Date: Thu, 3 Jul 2025 10:30:11 -0400 Subject: Your card ending 1923 expires this month—update now Message-ID: <20250703143011.2006.card@showtime.com> Hi Maya, Visa •••• 1923 expires 31 Jul 2025. Add a new payment method before your 2 Aug renewal to avoid interruption. Update card → Account › Billing Thank you! SHOWTIME Customer Care

From: SHOWTIME <alerts@mail.showtime.com> To: maya_li@yahoo.ca Date: Tue, 6 Aug 2025 02:44:03 -0400 Subject: We couldn’t process your August payment Message-ID: <20250806064403.2007.fail@showtime.com> Maya, Your August charge (CA $12.99) was declined. We’ll retry automatically on 9 Aug 2025. Update your details → https://www.showtime.com/billing —SHOWTIME Billing Support

From: SHOWTIME <alerts@mail.showtime.com> To: maya_li@yahoo.ca Date: Fri, 9 Aug 2025 02:44:03 -0400 Subject: Final attempt in 72 hours—action required Message-ID: <20250809064403.2008.final@showtime.com> Hi Maya, Our second retry on 9 Aug 2025 failed. We’ll make a final attempt on 12 Aug 2025. Update payment to keep streaming. —SHOWTIME

From: SHOWTIME <noreply@mail.showtime.com> To: maya_li@yahoo.ca Date: Tue, 13 Aug 2025 00:15:20 -0400 Subject: Streaming paused—payment required Message-ID: <20250813041520.2009.suspend@showtime.com> Hello Maya, We couldn’t process your payment. Your subscription is now suspended. Reactivate anytime by adding a valid payment method. We’ll save your watch list for 90 days. —SHOWTIME

From: SHOWTIME <support@mail.showtime.com> To: maya_li@yahoo.ca Date: Fri, 15 Aug 2025 11:44:07 -0400 Subject: Welcome back—your access is restored Message-ID: <20250815154407.2010.resume@showtime.com> Hi Maya, Thanks for updating your payment info! Your plan is active again. Next charge: 15 Sep 2025. Catch the new episode of “The Chi” tonight. Enjoy! SHOWTIME Team

From: SHOWTIME <support@mail.showtime.com> To: brian.taylor@icloud.com Date: Wed, 15 Oct 2025 11:43:12 -0400 Subject: You’ve upgraded to Paramount+ with SHOWTIME Message-ID: <20251015154312.2011.upgrade@showtime.com> Hi Brian, Your account now includes Paramount+ for blockbuster films and NFL on CBS. • Pro-rated charge today: £4.20 • New monthly price starting 15 Nov 2025: £15.99 Start exploring → https://www.showtime.com/paramountplus —SHOWTIME Support

From: SHOWTIME <support@mail.showtime.com> To: brian.taylor@icloud.com Date: Tue, 10 Jan 2026 09:17:55 -0500 Subject: Your plan has been changed to SHOWTIME-only Message-ID: <20260110141755.2012.downgrade@showtime.com> Hi Brian, As requested, you’ll switch to SHOWTIME-only (£10.99/mo) on 10 Feb 2026. Paramount+ access ends then. Thanks for watching! SHOWTIME

From: SHOWTIME <news@mail.showtime.com> To: pierre.martin@example.fr Date: Mon, 12 May 2025 12:02:18 +0200 Subject: Upcoming change to your SHOWTIME price Message-ID: <20250512100218.2013.price@showtime.com> Bonjour Pierre, From 12 Jun 2025 your monthly fee will change from €10,99 to €11,99. The increase funds new originals and expanded sports coverage. To cancel, visit Account › Subscription before 11 Jun 2025. Merci de votre soutien, SHOWTIME

From: SHOWTIME <legal@mail.showtime.com> To: lucy.dawson@protonmail.com Date: Fri, 21 Jun 2025 15:22:11 +0000 Subject: GST rate change effective 1 Jul 2025 Message-ID: <20250621152211.2014.tax@showtime.com> Dear Lucy, Australia’s GST on digital services rises from 10 % to 12 % on 1 Jul 2025. Your base fee (A$14.99) stays the same; tax adjusts automatically. Details → https://www.showtime.com/gst-update Regards, SHOWTIME Compliance

From: SHOWTIME <billing@mail.showtime.com> To: jorge.ramirez@outlook.com Date: Wed, 1 Jan 2026 08:15:00 -0500 Subject: Your annual SHOWTIME plan renewed Message-ID: <20260101131500.2015.renew@showtime.com> Hola Jorge, Your Annual HD Plan has renewed. • Amount charged: US $109.99 • Transaction ID: ST-TXN-20260101-7788 • Next renewal: 1 Jan 2027 Thanks for staying with SHOWTIME.

From: SHOWTIME <goodbye@mail.showtime.com> To: tomas.ivanov@example.cz Date: Tue, 22 Apr 2025 10:30:11 +0200 Subject: We’re sorry to see you go, Tomáš Message-ID: <20250422103011.2016.cancel@showtime.com> Hi Tomáš, Your subscription was cancelled effective 22 Apr 2025. You’ll retain access until 5 May 2025. Tell us why (2-min survey) → https://www.showtime.com/exit-survey You’re welcome back anytime. —SHOWTIME

From: SHOWTIME <offers@mail.showtime.com> To: former.user@isp.eu Date: Thu, 9 Oct 2025 12:01:00 +0000 Subject: Rejoin SHOWTIME at 40 % off—this week only Message-ID: <20251009120100.2017.winback@showtime.com> Hello, Restart your subscription by 16 Oct 2025 for €6.59/mo (40 % discount). Code: RETURN40 Chat with us → https://support.showtime.com —Marketing, SHOWTIME

From: SHOWTIME <gifts@mail.showtime.com> To: kevin.doe@samplemail.com Date: Wed, 3 Dec 2025 07:33:33 -0500 Subject: Your SHOWTIME gift for Sarah has been delivered Message-ID: <20251203123333.2018.gift@showtime.com> Hi Kevin, We emailed your 12-month gift to sarah.brown@samplemail.com. Order #: ST-GFT-55003322 Thanks for sharing SHOWTIME!

From: SHOWTIME <gifts@mail.showtime.com> To: kevin.doe@samplemail.com Date: Mon, 3 Nov 2026 08:20:44 -0500 Subject: Your gift for Sarah renews 3 Dec—manage anytime Message-ID: <20261103132044.2019.gift-renew@showtime.com> Kevin, We’ll renew Sarah’s gift on 3 Dec 2026 for US $109.99. Cancel auto-renew in Gifts › Manage before 2 Dec. Thank you, SHOWTIME Gifts

From: SHOWTIME <gifts@mail.showtime.com> To: sarah.brown@samplemail.com Date: Wed, 3 Dec 2025 07:34:10 -0500 Subject: Your SHOWTIME gift is active—start watching Message-ID: <20251203123410.2020.gift-accept@showtime.com> Hi Sarah, Kevin sent you a 12-month SHOWTIME subscription. Sign in with this email to begin streaming. Enjoy! SHOWTIME

From: SHOWTIME <security@mail.showtime.com> To: pierre.martin@example.fr Date: Fri, 9 May 2025 22:11:30 +0200 Subject: New sign-in from Firefox on Windows Message-ID: <20250509201130.2021.security@showtime.com> Bonjour Pierre, Your SHOWTIME account was accessed from Lyon, FR at 22:09 CEST. If this wasn’t you, reset your password: https://www.showtime.com/reset SHOWTIME Security

From: SHOWTIME <security@mail.showtime.com> To: pierre.martin@example.fr Date: Fri, 9 May 2025 22:15:00 +0200 Subject: Two-step verification is now on Message-ID: <20250509201500.2022.2fa@showtime.com> Thanks, Pierre—TOTP codes are now required at sign-in. Questions? security@showtime.com

From: SHOWTIME <legal@mail.showtime.com> To: all-subscribers@mail.showtime.com Date: Mon, 3 Mar 2025 18:00:00 +0000 Subject: We’re updating our Terms of Use—effective 3 Apr 2025 Message-ID: <20250303180000.2023.tos@showtime.com> Dear Subscriber, Key changes: clearer refund rules and updated dispute-resolution process. Using SHOWTIME after 3 Apr 2025 means you accept the new terms. Full text → https://www.showtime.com/terms-2025 SHOWTIME Legal

From: SHOWTIME <privacy@mail.showtime.com> To: all-subscribers@mail.showtime.com Date: Tue, 4 Mar 2025 09:45:00 +0000 Subject: Our Privacy Policy has changed Message-ID: <20250304094500.2024.privacy@showtime.com> We’ve added details on personalised ads and cookie retention. Read more: https://www.showtime.com/privacy-2025 Contact: privacy@showtime.com

From: SHOWTIME <newsdesk@mail.showtime.com> To: alex.lopez@example.com Date: Tue, 22 Apr 2025 14:03:18 +0000 Subject: Streaming now: “Dexter – Origins” Episode 1 Message-ID: <20250422140318.2025.alert@showtime.com> Hi Alex, Episode 1 of the new series “Dexter – Origins” is now available. Watch anytime → https://sho.com/dexter-origins You received this because you follow Crime Drama in your preferences.
